sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Boeing topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 5.3%.
Year to date, Boeing has lost about 44.4% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 0.8%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 32.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group, trading down 0.6%, and Microsoft, trading up 3.4% on the day.
